#summary Current Status
#labels Featured

The following is a list of SVG element types and how well supported they are in svg2vml.  If no support is listed, assume that svg2vml doesn't yet support that element at all.
<font color="#DD0000">
<font color="#349a34">    * a - Native Support from browser (unless a specific case is provided) </font>
    * altGlyph
    * altGlyphDef
    * altGlyphItem
    * animate
    * animateColor
    * animateMotion
    * animateTransform
<font color="#DD6600">    * circle - partial support</font>
    * clipPath
    * color-profile
    * cursor
    * definition-src
    * defs
    * desc
<font color="#DD6600">    * ellipse - partial support</font>
    * feBlend
    * feColorMatrix
    * feComponentTransfer
    * feComposite
    * feConvolveMatrix
    * feDiffuseLighting
    * feDisplacementMap
    * feDistantLight
    * feFlood
    * feFuncA
    * feFuncB
    * feFuncG
    * feFuncR
    * feGaussianBlur
    * feImage
    * feMerge
    * feMergeNode
    * feMorphology
    * feOffset
    * fePointLight
    * feSpecularLighting
    * feSpotLight
    * feTile
    * feTurbulence
    * filter
    * font
    * font-face
    * font-face-format
    * font-face-name
    * font-face-src
    * font-face-uri
    * foreignObject
<font color="#DD6600">    * g - partial support</font>
    * glyph
    * glyphRef
    * hkern
    * image
<font color="#DD6600">    * line - partial support
    * linearGradient - partial support</font>
    * marker
    * mask
    * metadata
    * missing-glyph
    * mpath
<font color="#DD6600">    * path - partial support</font>
    * pattern
<font color="#DD6600">    * <font color="#DD6600">polygon - partial support
    * <font color="#DD6600">polyline - partial support</font>
    * radialGradient
<font color="#DD6600">    * rect - partial support</font>
    * script
    * set
<font color="#DD6600">    * stop - partial support</font>
    * style
<font color="#DD6600">    * svg - partial support</font>
    * switch
    * symbol
    * text
    * textPath
    * title
    * tref
    * tspan
    * use
    * view
    * vkern
</font>
